detail.name: Força para a Força
detail.headline: Força para a Força: Marilia e Diego levando a sua força para o mundo
detail.budget: O orçamento para projetos anteriores a 24/02/2015 normalmente pode ser encontrado na descrição acima.
detail.about_html:
English version at the bottom of the page

Este projeto destina-se a financiar a participação dos atletas e professores Marília Coutinho e Diego Figueroa num dos mais importantes campeonatos da modalidade POWERLIFTING, o NAPR/RPS International Open, que será realizado em Columbus, Ohio, dia 1 de março de 2013. Powerlifting é um dos dois esportes de LEVANTAMENTO DE PESO. É um esporte não-olímpico cujas disciplinas – agachamento, supino e levantamento terra – expressam, em sua condição pura e máxima, o alfabeto fundamental do movimento humano. Por este motivo, o powerlifting, ou levantamento de peso básico, é um esporte e um repertório de movimento que fundamenta o treinamento e condicionamento de todas as pessoas. Marília Coutinho é campeã mundial por diferentes federações e a única latino-americana que detém um recorde histórico (de todos os tempos, em todas as federações). Diego Figueroa é vice-campeão mundial pelo World Powerlifting Congress. Marília Coutinho é bióloga, mestre em ecologia química, doutora em sociologia da ciência e especialista em treinamento de força. Diego Figueroa é educador físico, mestre em fisiologia cardio-vascular e doutorando no mesmo tema. Hoje, são os dois profissionais mais qualificados no treinamento para FORÇA no país. Viabilizar a participação destes dois professores e atletas de alto rendimento é um investimento na saúde pública e no conhecimento sobre o movimento humano, sua recuperação e qualidade. Você, apoiador, receberá material valioso em informação para seu bem estar físico, mental e espiritual. Serão e-books, newsletters e até programas individualizados de treino, conforme seu apoio.

Saiba mais:

Sobre os atletas e professores Marilia e Diego: http://www.mariliacoutinho.com http://www.opositivo.esp.br Entrevistas, matérias na grande imprensa, programas de TV (Marília Coutinho) http://www.mariliacoutinho.com/marilia-na-midia/

Sobre o esporte: Marilia Coutinho. Powerlifting: de volta ao básico. Editora Phorte, São Paulo, 2011. http://www.phorte.com.br/livro-powerlifting-volta-ao-basico-465 Powerlifting Watch (o maior portal mundial do esporte) http://www.powerliftingwatch.com

Videos Canal do Youtube da Marília: http://www.youtube.com/user/marilia05 Canal do Youtube do Diego: http://www.youtube.com/user/profdiegofigueroa

Treinos:

POWER TO STRENGTH

This Project was designed to fund our participation at the NAPR/PRS International Open Championship by covering our travel expenses. However, it is not just about our personal desire to lift at one of the most important events of our sport. It goes way beyond that. The NAPR/PRS International Open will take place in Columbus, Ohio, on March 1st. To those acquainted with the sports scene, it is one of the most exciting moments of the year, where the greatest events happen at the same time, at the same place. The NAPR/PRS International Open is a powerlifting championship. Powerlifting is a weight lifting sport with three disciplines performed in consecutive manner in competitions: the squat, the bench press and the deadlift. These lifts are the essential manifestation of the human movement alphabet: the most basic motor actions a human being does are to squat, to push and to pull. If you are as good at those as when you were born, you have chances of keeping healthy. If not, you have lost functionality. Powerlifting is the resource from which to create training methods, movements and protocols for just about everything: from rehabilitating injured or elderly patients who lost functionality to improving any athlete’s performance, from any sport.

The two athletes who designed this project are the highest authorities in powerlifting and strength training in Latin America

Marilia Coutinho is twice world champion, holds a number of world records and is the only Latin American to hold a historical all time powerlifting record (in the squat). She is also a scholar, a writer, a coach and the author of the only book written in any of the Latin languages about powerlifting and its many applications.

Diego Figueroa is WPC world vice-champion. He is a physical educator, holds a M.Sc. degree in physiology and is enrolled in a doctorate program in cardiology. Each time they travel abroad to compete, they use the opportunity to interact with athletes and coaches from all over the world. They produce rich information material including video interviews, video recordings of training sessions in high performance training centers, articles and books.

Supporting their competitive activities is an investment in the production of knowledge about strength and how it should be developed. It is an investment in public health and sport, as one of the elements of the civilizatory cultural tripod (sport, science and art).

In return for your support, you will receive, first hand, information products in the form of e-books, newsletters and even workout prescriptions. These high value products and services are a token of our partnership with you in this exciting journey towards the World of Strength.

US$12____One ebook about one of the following subjects: advanced training issues; training basics; social, philosophical and anthropological issues about sports, strength and movement.

US$25____Two ebooks about one of the following subjects: advanced training issues; training basics; social, philosophical and anthropological issues about sports, strength and movement.

US$50____One ebook about one of the following subjects: advanced training issues; training basics; social, philosophical and anthropological issues about sports, strength and movement AND A t-shirt with our logo

US$100____Two ebooks about one of the following subjects: advanced training issues; training basics; social, philosophical and anthropological issues about sports, strength and movement AND one bi-monthly newsletter about STRENGTH (technical and social aspects)

US$250____Three ebooks about one of the following subjects: advanced training issues; training basics; social, philosophical and anthropological issues about sports, strength and movement AND one bi-monthly newsletter about STRENGTH (technical and social aspects).OR, if you are a company: Your logo in our uniform and sharing your company’s support in our social media

US$500____Three ebooks about one of the following subjects: advanced training issues; training basics; social, philosophical and anthropological issues about sports, strength and movement AND A personal 10 week workout plan. OR, if you are a company: Your logo in our uniform, sharing your company’s support in our social media and your link at our websites as official sponsor for our 2013 competitive season

US$750____Three ebooks about one of the following subjects: advanced training issues; training basics; social, philosophical and anthropological issues about sports, strength and movement AND Two personal 10 week workout plans. OR, if you are a company: Your logo in our uniform, sharing your company’s support in our social media, your link at our websites as official sponsor for our 2013 competitive season plus two articles about your product/service for your use (and published in our websites)

user.name: Marilia Coutinho
user.about_html: Possui graduação, mestrado e doutorado pela USP e pós-doutorado pela Virginia Tech. Bi-campeã mundial em levantamento de peso básico.

rewards.description:
Três ebooks sobre treinamento avançado ou três ebooks sobre treinamento para iniciantes ou três ebooks sobre questões sociais, filosóficas e antropológicas da corporalidade, força e movimento
E
Um planejamento individualizado de treinamento para 10 semanas. Ou se for uma empresa: A logomarca da sua empresa em nosso uniforme, a divulgação do seu apoio em nossas mídias e seu link em nossos sites como patrocinador oficial da nossa participação competitiva em 2013
